original_title: Tex Granger: Midnight Rider of the Plains
overview: Tex Granger heads toward Three Buttes when he comes across a young boy guarding a gold shipment which he has just rescued from a stagecoach that had been held up by Blaze Talbot and Reno
tagline: GALLOPING THRILL-HOT ADVENTURE! BLAZING SERIAL GLORY!
title: Tex Granger: Midnight Rider of the Plains
